wiki.content: According to the One and Only Songfacts, this song was partly inspired by the 1999 high school-themed romantic comedy Never Been Kissed. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the One and Only Songfacts, this song was partly inspired by the 1999 high school-themed romantic comedy Never Been Kissed.
